Summary: 3rd night in observation, objects (4), follows star-like rotation, strobe lights in various colors, 3 witnesses. No noise, few dogs barking. The distance tells us these objects are over the ocean at Vero Beach, Fla. Everything we see has passed under.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is now the third night of observing strobing lights off the beaches of Sebastian and Vero Beach, Florida. 1 or 2 were more inland. The lights are bright red, indigo, green, amber and white. We have observed other objects in the sky and have seen the neighboring stars only showing their white lights...sats, shooting stars, planes and none have displayed the bright colors these objects have given to us. They move with the stars as our planet rotates and they show up again the next night for another 2 or 3 hours of colorful lights and we fall asleep. Can someone help us and tell us what these lights are?
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Sebastian
There was one other sighting in Sebastian on or around January 16th 2013
